text: Timothy Lee Lester (June 15, 1968 â€“ January 12, 2021) was an American football professional running back. He played in the National Football League for eight seasons for the Los Angeles Rams, Pittsburgh Steelers, and Dallas Cowboys. He was born in Miami, Florida. On January 12, 2021, Lester died in Milton, Georgia from COVID-19 at the age of 52. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Los Angeles Rams players Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players Category:Dallas Cowboys players Category:American football running backs Category:Sportspeople from Miami
title: Tim Lester (running back)
